Name: Brian Tytherleigh
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible for ensuring that the planning/performance and business change models are working together to achieve organisational objectives. Deputises for the CEO where appropriate. Senior Responsible Owner for Children's Workforce programme.

Name: Dave Poulsom
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Company Secretary. Senior Responsible Owner for Finance/Procurement/Facilities Management and IT.

Name: Keith Brumfitt
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible for ensuring that the organisation provides a coherent offering to Children's Trusts. Senior Responsible Owner for the social work programme.

Name: Steve Crisp
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible for ensuring that the organisation provides a coherent offering to employers. Senior Responsible Owner for the the Sector Investment Programme.

Name: Jane Haywood
Job/Team Function: The executive head of the organisation - reporting to the Chair. The accountable officer. Provides leadership/support and supervision to the Executive Directors and Senior Management Team.

Name: Sir Paul Ennals CBE
Job/Team Function: Non-executive chair of the company. Provides leadership/support and supervision to the Chief Executive Officer and Executive Board. Responsible for reviewing the organisation's strategic direction.

Name: Deirdre Quill
Job Title: Director of Early Intervention and Prevention
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible for ensuring that CWDC programmes support the children's workforce to provide early intervention and prevention. Senior Responsible Owner for the Parents and Family programme.
